sentence.Network_en: From what I was able to glean, it appears they don't intend to take any action yet.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据我所收集到的资料分析, 他们看来还不打算采取任何行动.

sentence.Network_en: From these I glean an approach: I admit we harvested the beavers.
sentence.Network_cn: 我从这些案例中摸索出了一个办法: 先承认我们是在清理海狸.

sentence.Network_en: The little information that we could glean about them was largely contradictory.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们能够收集到的有关它们的少量信息大部分是自相矛盾的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French glener, from late Latin glennare, probably of Celtic origin

entry.tran: 耐心学习，仔细收集（信息、知识等）
entry.def: If you glean something such as information or knowledge, you learn or collect it slowly and patiently, and perhaps indirectly.

example.ex: At present we're gleaning information from all sources...
example.tran: 目前，我们正从各种渠道收集信息。

example.ex: 10,000 pages of evidence were gleaned from hundreds and hundreds of interviews.
example.tran: 从无数次的采访中收集到了长达一万页的证据。

auth_sentence.content: Joy could he from Night's soft presence glean.

means.word_mean: 一点点地收集(资料、事实)

sentences.en: From what I was able to glean, it appears they don’t intend to take any action yet.
sentences.cn: 根据我所收集到的资料分析, 他们看来还不打算采取任何行动。
